module.name: design_management
module.keywords: module, design object, add, delete, change, manage

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the association between an original product definition and a planned product definition. The planned product definition is based upon the original definition. Changes shall be limited to those that when applied result in a valid product definition, but this part of ISO 10303 does not define the properties of a valid change.

inscope.li: identifying modifications of design data on an per entity instance level, including add, delete and modify;
assigning such modifications to a particular work order or work request;
linking modifications with current and previous designs of product versions;
marking and approving design data on an per entity instance level as frozen;
items within the scope of Approval_arm;
items within the scope of Product_view_definition_arm;
items within the scope of Work_order_arm;
items within the scope of Work_request_arm.

outscope.li: undo and redo operations on design data.
definition of the properties of a valid change.
